name: Cubism (itch)
description:
Cubism is a simple yet challenging puzzle game in VR.

Inspired by classic solid dissection puzzles like the Soma cube, players have to assemble increasingly complex shapes out of smaller puzzle pieces.

The full release of Cubism is currently still under development. You can sign up for the newsletter to be the first to know when the game comes out.

In the meantime, try out the free Demo below! It works on Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, and all Windows MR Headsets. 

www.cubism-vr.com 
@CubismVR
